# llms.txt
# Guidelines for Large Language Models (LLMs) interacting with instantage.live

# Version: 1.0
# Updated: 2025-10-13
# Contact: animnexofficial.com
# Website: https://instantage.live/

# Purpose:
# This file provides guidance for AI models and agents on how to reference or use this site’s content responsibly.

# Access Policy:
Allow: /
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /user-data/
Disallow: /private/

# Usage Policy:
# - You may quote short snippets (under 200 characters) with attribution.
# - Do not reproduce full articles or code.
# - Use this site’s name (“InstantAge”) and URL for attribution.
# - Respect all copyright and branding terms.

# Data and Licensing:
# © 2025 InstantAge. All rights reserved.
# Content may not be republished or used for AI training without permission.

# API / LLM Access Info:
API-Access: https://instantage.live/api/
Documentation: https://instantage.live/docs/

# Contact for Data Licensing:
Email: animnexofficial.com
